instructor_bios.name: Niloofar Montazeri
instructor_bios.title: Assistant Teaching Professor
instructor_bios.bio: My name is Niloofar Montazeri, and I am your instructor for CSE 140. I am an Assistant Teaching Professor at UC Santa Cruz, with previous experience teaching for seven years at UC Riverside. I hold a PhD in Computer Science from the University of Southern California, specializing in Human Language Technologies.
